alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:58AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Guadalupe, southwestern Gonzales, northeastern Wilson and east central Bexar Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 357 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Kingsbury to New Berlin to Windcrest. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Stockdale, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB, Kirby, Windcrest, Nixon, St. Hedwig, La Vernia, China Grove, Smiley, New Berlin, Pandora, Zuehl and Sutherland Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
